channel.title: PassTheCert on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in PassTheCert on TLDRBins

item.title: ADCS
item.description: Enum (From Linux) certipy-ad certipy-ad find -u <USER> -p <PASSWORD> -target <TARGET> -text -stdout -vulnerable nxc nxc ldap <TARGET> -u <USER> -p <PASSWORD> -M adcs Enum (From Windows) Powershell # Check ADCS service net start | findstr /i cert # Check env certutil # List cert templates certutil -catemplates Certify.exe # Get info of each template .\certify.exe find # Find vuln templates .\certify.exe find /vulnerable /currentuser ADCSTemplate ADCSTemplate import-module .
